name: Colonialism and Post-colonialism in French Cinema
description: A study of a selection of films from Francophone countries focusing on the history and ideological background of the French colonization of various regions - for instance North Africa, Sub-Saharan Africa, and the Far East - and of the consequences of colonialism for modern France. [24L, 24T]
prerequisites: FRE283H5, FRE280Y5 or a minimum grade of 77% in FSL406H5 or equivalent.
